name: The Ultimate More Mixed Trivia Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions

questions.text: Who plays Julia Robert's mother in 'Steel Magnolias'?
questions.explanation:
Sally Field.

	Sally Field plays the mother from wedding to funeral.

questions.text: What would you do with a satsuma?
questions.explanation:
Eat it.

	Eat it, it's a variety of orange.

questions.text: How many cities are there in London (England)?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Two: the city of London and the city of Westminster.

Malcolm Bradbury.

	Malcolm Bradbury who died in 2000. 'The History Man' is a classic satire of provincial academia and human frailty.

questions.text: Where would you find a root partition?
questions.explanation:
Computer server.

	You would find the root partition on a unix-based server. It holds the master set of directories.

questions.text: Who succeeded Margaret Thatcher as leader of the Conservative Party?
questions.explanation:
John Major & Major.

	John Major was the surprise victor but has now returned to relative obscurity after losing the 1997 General Election to Tony Blair.

questions.text: What is the name of the odious clergyman in 'Pride and Prejudice'?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Collins

	Mr. Collins is linked to various characters in the {plot;} he is a cousin of the Bennetts, a suitor to Elizabeth, and is parish priest to Mr. Darcy's aunt, Lady Catherine de Burgh.

questions.text: What is the capital of the Free State, South Africa?
questions.explanation:
Bloemfontein.

	Bloemfontein means "flowering spring". The South African Supreme Court is in Bloemfontein.

questions.text: What is the name of the librarian in 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer'?
questions.explanation:
Giles.

	Giles is played by British actor Anthony Stewart Head, best known prior to 'Buffy' for his coffee ads.

questions.text: Which of the following was NOT a daughter of Tsar Nicolas II of Russia?
questions.explanation:
Alexandra.

	Alexandra was his wife. They had a son Alexis and four daughters, Maria, Olga, Tatiana and Anastasia.
